Subject: Re: A message to VorbIss, The D.E.D ships secret.
References: <3B82B0A9.15478.2704233@localhost>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

As soon as Spinister neared the base, he transformed, ans floated down
gracefully to the entrance. He turned around for a second, gripping the
door, and looked at Megaton, with narrowed eyes. The door opened for
him, and he slowly backed in, and immeadiatly headed towards Havotron's
chambre, and when he was almost there, was greeted by the orb. He walked
into Havotron's room completly silent, only the woosh of air from the
shutting door giving him away. He stood to attention for his leader, in
a perfect position.
